availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James D. White (Ballard County, Kentucky, attorney.)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, attorney. Hickman County, Kentucky, native. Son of Willis White and Mary Wright White. Married to Mary E. Coil White on June 19, 1860. Father of William White and Willis White. Attorney in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, pp. 566-567.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Corporation of Blandville, p. 413B.
Memorial Record of Western Kentucky, vol. 1 (Chicago: The Lewis Publishing Company, 1904): pp. 138-140.
"Death Claims Jas. D. White," The Paducah Evening Sun (Paducah, KY), February 6, 1915, p. 7.
"Judge James Dempsey White (1831-1915)," Find A Grave, Memorial 118960025, accessed November 29, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/118960025.
